scripts.api-codegen:remove-version: jq 'del(.["generator-cli"].version)' openapitools.json > tmp.json; mv tmp.json openapitools.json
scripts.build-ui: rm -rf quartz-manager-ui/src/main/resources/META-INF/resources/webjars/quartz-manager-ui; mkdir -p quartz-manager-ui/src/main/resources/META-INF/resources/webjars/quartz-manager-ui; cd quartz-manager-ui/quartz-manager-ui && pnpm install && pnpm generate --dotenv webjar.env && cd ../..; cp -r -p quartz-manager-ui/quartz-manager-ui/.output/public/* quartz-manager-ui/src/main/resources/META-INF/resources/webjars/quartz-manager-ui
scripts.api-codegen:copy: pnpm api-codegen:clean; pnpm api-codegen:remove-version; pnpm api-codegen; yes | cp -r ./target/client-project/src/main/ ./quartz-manager-api/src/test/;  sbt Test/scalafmt;
